title: Lesniczowka
overview: Love, secrets, turbulent family history plus beautiful nature - all this in the soap opera "Leśniczówka", dir. Maciej Żak. The forester's lodge is a place where the family of Katarzyna Ruszczyc (Jolanta Fraszyńska) moves after the sudden death of her beloved grandfather Antoni (Marian Dziędziel), a forester who was shot in mysterious circumstances. Katarzyna, together with her father's house, takes over family secrets from the past. He is faced with the dilemma of whether to cultivate secrets or, on the contrary, to undertake the clarification of unresolved matters. Life in the forester's lodge is only an apparent springboard from the hustle and bustle of the city. In the series, against the backdrop of beautiful nature, history is intertwined with reality - family secrets are related, among others, by to the unique history of Poland.
